item.title: Shiny apps with GNIP data
item.description: (in progress) Apps hosted on shinyapps.io can’t be displayed on published Rmarkdown pages. This is an intentional limitation of shinyapps, to prevent overuse by bots that might crawl a public page elsewhere. An app can be embedded in an Rmarkdown document, as a frame linked to the app, or as embedded Shiny code if the Rmarkdown file won’t be used to generate a static page. For use with Hugo, I’d have to host my apps somewhere other than shinyapps.
